name: Will (Mobiius)
description:
This is my submission for the D11 Game Jam for mental health awareness week.

It shows what I felt like when I suffered from depression, and some of the steps I went through to help myself feel better.

Flashing areas highlight things to interact with, remember, some things are out of reach until you crouch!

Squeeze the triggers to summon the will to act and light your way, but act quickly because you'll eventually run out of will, and will have to wait to gain it back. Completing a task fully will increase the speed you regain your will.
